metadata.Title: CVE-2023-40475 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.Description:
[Integer overflow leading to heap overwrite in MXF file handling with AES3audio]

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-40475` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-gst-plugins-bad-1.0 - 1.20.3-0ubuntu1.1
gstreamer1.0-opencv - 1.20.3-0ubuntu1.1
gstreamer1.0-plugins-bad - 1.20.3-0ubuntu1.1
gstreamer1.0-plugins-bad-apps - 1.20.3-0ubuntu1.1
gstreamer1.0-wpe - 1.20.3-0ubuntu1.1
libgstreamer-opencv1.0-0 - 1.20.3-0ubuntu1.1
libgstreamer-plugins-bad1.0-0 - 1.20.3-0ubuntu1.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: gst-plugins-bad1.0 package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.20.3-0ubuntu1.1').
